original_text: And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, every stone about the weight of a talent: and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail; for the plague thereof was exceeding great.
korean_text: 또 무게가 한 달란트나 되는 큰 우박이 하늘로부터 사람들에게 내리매 사람들이 그 우박의 재앙 때문에 하나님을 비방하니 그 재앙이 심히 큼이러라

sentences.original_text: And there fell upon men a great hail
every stone about the weight of a talent
sentences.korean_translation: 각 돌은 한 달란트 무게쯤 되었다

sentences.original_text: because of the plague of the hail
for the plague thereof was exceeding great
